short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays Canada weather and alerts from Environment Canada
short.fr: Cette extension affiche les données et les alertes météo provenant d'Environnement Canada

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension fetches real-time weather data and alerts from Environment Canada for Canadian cities. Stay informed with accurate forecasts and updates directly in your browser. 

Available in light/dark mode.

Aussi disponible en français.
